verses.padam: (Padam) anumatyAq̍ ityanu-matyai|̍ purODAśa̱m| aśhTAkapAlamityaśhTA-kapAqlam|̍ niriti|̍ vapati| dhEnuH| dakśhiṇA|̍ yE| pratya~jcaH|̍ śamyAyAH|̍ avaśIyanta̍ ityava̍ - śIyantE|̍ tam| naiṛ qRutamiti# naiH - Rutam| EkakapAlamityEka̍# - kapAqlam| kRuśhṇam| vAsaH|̍ kRuśhṇatUśhamiti̍# kRuśhṇa-tUśham| dakśhiṇA|̍ vIti|̍ ihi| svAhA̱| AhutimityA-hutim|̍ juśhAqṇaH| EśhaH| tE| niṛ qRuta iti# niH-RutE| BAqgaH| BUtE̱| haviśhmatI|̍ asi| mu~jca| imam| aṃhasaH|̍ svAhA̱| namaH|̍ yaH| idam| cakAra|̍ Aqdityam| carum| niriti|̍ vapati| varaH|̍ dakśhiṇA|̍ AqgnAqvaiśhṇavamityA̱gnA - vaiśhṇavam| EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAqlam| vAqmanaH| vahI| dakśhiṇA|̍ agnIśhOmIyamityagnI̍ - sOmIya̱m| 1 (50)
verses.samhita: anumatyai̍ purODAśa-maśhTAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ dhEnur dakśhiṇAq̍ yE pratya~jcaH śaM~MyAyA̍ avaśIyantE̍ taM naiṛ Ruta-mEkakapAlaM̍ kRuśhṇaM ~MvAsaH̍ kRuśhṇatUśhaM̍ dakśhiṇAq̍ vIhi svAhA&&hutiM̍ juśhAqṇa Eśha tE# niṛ RutE BAqgO BUtE# haviśhmatyasi̍ mu~jcEma-maṃhasaH̍ svAhAq namO ya idaM cakArA&&dityaM̍ caruM nirvapati̍ varO dakśhiṇA&&gnAvaiśhṇava-mEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ ~MvAmanO vahI dakśhiṇA̍ &gnIśhOmIya - [ ] 1

verses.padam: (Padam) EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa-kapAqlam|̍ hiraṇyam|̍ dakśhiṇA|̍ aindram| EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAqlam| RuśhaBaH| vahI| dakśhiṇA|̍ AqgnEyam| aśhTAkapAlamityaśhTA-kapAqlam|̍ aindram| dadhi|̍ RuśhaBaH| vahI| dakśhiṇA|̍ aindrAqgnamityai̱ndra -agnam| dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ -kapAqlam| vaiśvadEvamiti# vaiśva - dEvam| carum| prathamaja iti# prathama - jaH| vathsaH| dakśhiṇA|̍ saumyam| śyAqmAqkam| carum| vAsaH|̍ dakśhiṇA|̍ sarasvatyai|̍ carum| sarasvatE|̍ carum| mithunau| gAvau̱| dakśhiṇA|̍ | 2 (34) (agnIśhOmIyaM-catustriṃśacca)(A1)̍
verses.samhita: mEkAdaśakapAlaṃq̍ hiraṇyaM̍ dakśhiṇaindra-mEkA̍daśakapAla-mRuśhaBO̍ vahI dakśhiṇA&&gnEya-maśhTAka̍pAlamaindraM̍ daddhyRuśhaBO̍ vahI dakśhiṇaindrAqgnaM̍ dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ ~MvaiśvadEvaM caruM prathamajO̍ vathsO dakśhiṇA̍ saumyaṅ śyAmAqkaM̍ caruM ~MvAsO dakśhiṇAq̍ sarasvatyai̍ caruṃ sarasvatE̍ caruM mithunau̍ gAvau dakśhiṇA|̍ | 2 (agnIśhOmIyaM-catustriṃśacca)̍ (A1)

verses.padam: (Padam) AqgnEyam| aśhTAkapAlamityaśhTA-kapAqlam|̍ niriti|̍ vapati| saumyam| carum| sAqvitram| dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa-kapAqlam|̍ sAqrasvatam| carum| pauśhṇam| carum| mAqrutam| saptakapAlamiti̍# sapta -kapAqlam| vaiśvadEvImiti# vaiśva - dEvIm| AqmikśhA̱m| dyAqvAqpRuthivyamiti̍# dyAvA-pRuthivya̱m| EkakapAlamityEka̍-kapAqlam|̍ | 3 (18) (AqgnEyaṃ saumyaM mAruta-maśhTAda̍śa)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: AqgnEyamaśhTAkapAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ saumyaM caruṃ sAvitraM-dvAda̍śakapAlaṃ̍ sArasvataM caruM pauśhṇaM caruM mArutaṃ̍ saptakapAlaM̍ ~MvaiśvadEvI-mAqmikśhA̱M dyAvApRuthivya-mEka̍kapAlaM|̍ | 3 (AqgnEyaṃ saumyaM mAruta-maśhTAda̍śa)̍ (A2)

verses.padam: (Padam) aindrAqgnamityai̱ndra - agnam| EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa-kapAqlam|̍ mAqrutIm| AqmikśhA̱m| vAqruṇIm| AqmikśhA̱m| kAqyam| EkakapAlamityEka̍-kapAqlaM|̍ praGAqsyAniti̍# pra-GAqsyAn|̍ havAqmahE| marutaH|̍ yajñavAhasa̍ iti# yajña - vAqhasaH| karaBEMṇa|̍ sajOśhasa̍ iti# sa - jOśhasaH|̍ | mO iti|̍ sviti|̍ naH| indra| pRuthsviti# pRut-su| dEva| astu|̍ sma| tE| śuśhminn| avayA| | mahI| hi| asya| mIDhuśhaH|̍ yavyA| haviśhmataH|̍ marutaH|̍ vandatE|̍ gIH| | yat| grAmE̱| yat| araṇyE|̍ yat| saBAyA̱m| yat| indriyE| | yat| śUdrE| yat| aryE̱| EnaH|̍ cakRuma| vayam| | yat ( )| Ekasya|̍ adhIti|̍ dharmaṇi|̍ tasya|̍ avayajanamitya̍va-yaja̍nam|̍ asi| svAhA̱| | akrann|̍ karma|̍ karmakRuta iti# karma-kRutaH|̍ saha| vAqcA| mayOBuvEti# mayaH-BuvA| | dEvEByaH|̍ karma|̍ kRutvA| asta̱m| prEti|̍ ita| sudAqnava iti# su-dAqnavaH| | 4 (70) (vayaM ~Myad-viṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: aindrAqgna-mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ mArutI-mAqmikśhA̱M ~MvAruṇI-mAqmikśhA̱M kAqyamEkakapAlaM̍ praGAqsyAn.̍ havAmahE marutO# yajñavAhasaH̍ karaMBEṇa# sajOśhasaH|̍ | mO śhU ṇa# indra pRuthsu dEvAstu# sma tE śuśhminnavayA| mahI hyasya̍ mIDhuśhO# yavyA| haviśhmatO̍ marutO vandatE̍ gIH| | yad grAmE yadaraṇyE̍ yath saBAyAqM ~MyadindriyE|̍ yacCUdrE yadarya# EnaścakRumA̍ vayaM| yadE ( ) kasyAdhi dharmaṇi̍ tasyAvayaja̍namasi̍ svAhA̱| | akran karma# karmakRutaH̍ saha vAqcA mayOBuvA|̍ dEvEByaH karma# kRutvA&staM prEta# sudAnavaH| | 4 (vayaM~Myad-viṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A3)

verses.padam: (Padam) agnayE̱| anIkavata̍ ityanIka̍ - vatE| purODAśa̱m| aśhTAkapAlamityaśhTA-kapAqlam|̍ niriti|̍ vapati| sAqkam| sUryEṇa|̍ udyatEtyut̍ - yatA| marudBya iti# marut - ByaH| sAqntapanEBya iti# sAM - tapanEByaH|̍ maddhyandinE|̍ carum| marudBya iti# marut-ByaH| gRuhamEdhiBya iti# gRuhamEdhi-ByaH| sarvAsAm|̍ dugdhE| sAqyam| carum| pUrṇA| darvi| parEti|̍ pata| supUrṇEti su - pUrṇAq| punaH|̍ Eti|̍ pata| | vasnA| iva| vIti|̍ krIṇAqvahai| iśha̱m| Urja̱m| śatakratO iti# śata-kratO| | dEhi| mE| dadAmi|̍ tE| nIti|̍ mE| dhEhi| nIti|̍ tE| dadhE| | nihAramiti# ni-hAra̱m| it| nIti|̍ mE| hara| nihAramiti# ni-hAra̱m| 5 (50)
verses.samhita: agnayE&nIkavatE̍ purODAśa-maśhTAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ sAqkaṃ sUryEṇOdyatA̍ marudByaH̍ sAntapanEByO# maddhyandinE̍ caruM marudByO# gRuhamEdhiByaH sarvAsAM̍ dugdhE sAqyaM caruM pUrṇA darvi̍ parApata̍ supU̱rṇAq punarA pata|̍ vasnEva vi krIṇAvahAq̍ iśhamUrjaṃ# śatakratO| | dEhi mE dadAmi̍ tE ni mE# dhEhi ni tE# dadhE| nihAraminni mE# harA ni hAraM- [ ] 5

verses.padam: (Padam) nIti|̍ harAqmi| tE| | marudBya iti# marut - ByaH| krIDiBya iti# krIDi-ByaH| purODAśa̱m| saptakapAlamiti̍# sapta-kapAqlam| niriti|̍ vapati| sAqkam| sUryEṇa|̍ udyatEtyut̍ - yatA| AqgnEyam| aśhTAkapAlamityaśhTA-kapAqlam|̍ niriti|̍ vapati| saumyam| carum| sAqvitram| dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa-kapAqlam|̍ sAqrasvatam| carum| pauśhṇam| carum| aindrAqgnamityai̱ndra - agnam| EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAqlam| aindram| carum| vaiśvakarmaṇamiti# vaiśva - kamarṇam| | EkakapAlamityEka̍-kapAqlam|̍ 6(30) (harAq nihAraM-triṃqśacca̍)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: ni harAmi̍ tE| | marudByaH̍ krIDiByaH̍ purODAśaṃ# saptakapAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ sAqkaṃ sUryEṇOdyatA&&gnEya-maśhTAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ saumyaM caruṃ sAvitraM̍ dvAdaśakapAlaṃ̍ sArasvataM caruM pauśhṇaM carumai̱ndrAqgna-mEkAdaśakapAla-maindraM̍ caruM ~Mvai̱śvakarmaṇa-mEkakapAlaM|̍ | 6 (harAq nihAraM-triṃqśacca̍)̍ (A4)

verses.padam: (Padam) sOmAya|̍ pitRumata iti# pitRu - matE̱| purODAśa̱m| śhaTkapAlamiti̍ śhaT - kapAqlam| niriti|̍ vapati| pitRuBya iti# pitRu - ByaH| baṛ qhiśhadBya iti# baṛ hiśhad-ByaH| dhAqnAH| pitRuBya iti# pitRu-ByaH| agniśhvAqttEBya ityagni-svAqttEBya̍H|̍ aBivAqnyAyAq̍ ityaBi-vAqnyA̍yai|̍ dugdhE| mantham| Etat| tE| tata| yE| ca| tvAm| anviti|̍ Etat| tE| pitAqmaha| prapitAqmahEti# pra - pitAqmaha| yE| ca| tvAm| anviti|̍ atra|̍ pitaraH| yathAqBAqgamiti# yathA - BAqgam| mandaddhvam| susadRuMśamiti# su - sadRuMśa̱m| tvAq| vayam| maGavanniti̍ maGa-vann|̍ mandiśhImahi|̍ | prEti|̍ nUnam| pUrṇavandhura̍ iti# pUrṇa - vandhuraH| stutaH| yAqsi| vaśAn|̍ anu|̍ | yOjA̱| nu| indra| tE| harI iti|̍ | 7 (50)
verses.samhita: sOmAya̍ pitRumatE# purODAśaṃq śhaTkapAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ pitRuByO# baṛ hiśhadByO# dhAqnAH pitRuByO̱&gniśhvAqttEByO# &BivAqnyAyai̍ dugdhE manthamEtat tE# tata yE ca tvA-manvEtat tE# pitAmaha prapitAmaha yE ca tvAmanvatra# pitarO yathABAqgaM mandaddhvaṃ̍ susandRuśaM̍ tvA vayaM maGavan̍ mandiśhImahi|̍ pranUnaM pUrṇavandhuraH̍ stutO yAsi̍ vaśAqṃq anu|̍ yOjAq nvindra̍ tE harI̱| | 7

verses.padam: (Padam) akśhann|̍ amImadanta|̍ hi| avEti|̍ priyAH| adhUśhata| | astOśhata|̍ svaBAnava̍ iti sva-BAqnavaH| viprA̱H| naviśhThayA|̍ matI| | yOjA̱| nu| indra| tE| harI iti|̍ | akśhann|̍ pitaraH|̍ amImadanta|̍ pitaraH|̍ | atItRupanta|̍ pitaraH|̍ amImRujanta|̍ pitaraH|̍ parEti|̍ ita| pitaraH| sOmyAqH| gaBIMqraiH| pathiBiriti# pathi-BiH| pUrvyaiH| | atha|̍ pitRUn| suvidatrAqniti# su - vidatrAn|̍ apIti|̍ ita| yamEna|̍ yE| sadhamAdamiti# sadha - mAda̱m| madanti|̍ | manaH|̍ nu| Eti|̍ huvAqmahE| nAqrAqśaṃqsEna|̍ stOmEna|̍ pitRuṇAm| ca| manmaBiriti̍ manma# - BiH| | Eti|̍ 8 (50)
verses.samhita: akśhannamImadanta̍ hyava# priyA adhUśhata|̍ astOśhata̍ svaBAnavO̍ viprAq naviśhThayA̍ matI| yOjAq nvindra̍ tE harI̱| | akśhan̍ pitarO&mImadanta̍ pitarO&tItRupanta̍ pitarO&mImRujanta̍ pitaraH|̍ | parEta̍ pitaraH sOmyA gaMBIraiH pathiBiH̍ pUrvyaiH| athA# pitRunth suvidatrAqṃq̍ apIta̍ yamEna yE sadhamAdaM̍ madanti|̍ | manO nvA huvAmahE̍ nArAśaṃqsEna stOmEna̍ pitRuṇAM ca manmaBiH|̍ | A - [ ] 8

verses.padam: (Padam) na| Etu| manaH|̍ punaH|̍ kratvE̱| dakśhAya|̍ jIvasE̱| | jyOk| ca| sUrya̱m| dRuśE| | punaH|̍ naH| pitaraH|̍ manaH|̍ dadAtu|̍ daivyaH|̍ janaH|̍ | jIvam| vrAta̱m| sacEmahi| | yat| antarikśham|̍ pRuthivIm| uta| dyAm| yat| mAqtara̱m| pitara̱m| vAq| jihiṃqsima| | agniH| mAq| tasmA̱t| EnasaH|̍ gAṛ hapatya̍ iti gAṛ ha-patyaH|̍ prEti|̍ mu~jcatu| duritEti# duH - itA| yAni|̍ cakRuma| karOtu|̍ mAm| anEnasa̱m| | 9 (44) (harI-manmaBirA-catu̍ścatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: na# Etu manaH punaH kratvE dakśhAya̍ jIvasE̱| jyOk ca sUryaM̍ dRuśE| | punarnaH̍ pitarO manO dadAtu̍ daivyO janaH|̍ jIvaM ~MvrAtaṃ# sacEmahi| | yadantarikśhaM̍ pRuthivImuta dyAM ~MyanmAqtaraM̍ pitaraM̍ ~MvA jihiṃsima| agnir mAq tasmAqdEnasO̍ gAṛ hapatyaH̍ pra mu~jcatu̍ duritA yAni# cakRuma karOtu mA-manEnasa̱M|̍ | 9 (harI-manmaBirA-catu̍ścatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A5)

verses.padam: (Padam) pratipUruśhamiti# prati-pUruśham| EkakapAlAqnityEka̍-kapAqlAqn|̍ niriti|̍ vapati| Eka̱m| atiriktamityati̍-riktam|̍ yAvantaH|̍ gRuhyA̱H| smaH| tEByaH|̍ kam| akaram| paśUnAm| śarma|̍ asi| śarma|̍ yajamAnasya|̍ śarma|̍ mE| yacCa| EkaH|̍ Eva| rudraH| na| dvitIyAya|̍ tasthE| AqKuH| tE| rudra| paśuH| tam| juśhasva| EśhaH| tE| rudra| BAqgaH| saha| svasrA̱| abiMkayA|̍ tam| juśhasva| BEśhajam| gavE̱| aśvAya|̍ puruśhAya|̍ BEśhajam| athO iti|̍ asmaByamityasma-Byam| BEśhajam| suBEśhajamiti̍ su - BEśhajam| 10 (50)
verses.samhita: pratipUruśhamEkakapAlAqn̍ nirvapatyEka-mati̍riktaM̍ ~MyAvantO̍ gRuhyA̱H smastEByaH kamakaraM̍ paśUnAṃ śarmAsi̍ śarma yajamAnasya̍ śarma# mE yacCaika# Eva rudrO na dvitIyAya̍ tastha AqKustE# rudra paśustaM juśhasvaiśha̍ tE# rudra BAqgaH saha svasrA&MbikayAq̍ taM juśhasva̍ BEśhajaM gavE&śvAya̍ puruśhAya̍ BEśhajamathO# asmaByaM̍ BEśhajaṃ suBEśhajaM̍ - [ ] 10

verses.padam: (Padam) yathA̱| asati|̍ | sugamiti# su-gam| mEśhAya|̍ mEśhyai̱| avEti|̍ abaMq| rudram| adimahi| avEti|̍ dEvam| tryabaMkamiti̍ tri-abaMqkam| | yathA̱| naH| śrEyasaH|̍ karat|̍ yathA̱| naH| vasyasaH|̍ karat|̍ yathA̱| naH| paśumata iti# paśu - mataH|̍ karat|̍ yathA̱| naH| vyavasAqyayAqditi# vi - avasAqyayA̱t| | tryabaMkamiti̍ tri - abaMqkam| yajAqmahE| sugandhimiti# su-gandhim| puśhTivad^^rdhanamiti̍# puśhTi-vad^^rdhanam|̍ | urvAqrukam| iva| bandhanAt|̍ mRutyOH| mukśhIya| mA| amRutA̱t| | EśhaH| tE| rudra| BAqgaH| tam| juśhasva| tEna|̍ avasEna|̍ paraH| mUjavata̍ iti mUja# - vataH| atIti|̍ ihi ( )| avatatadhanvEtyava̍tata̍ - dhanvAq| pinAkahasta̍ iti pinAka̍ - hastaH| kRuttivAsAq̍ iti kRutti# - vAqsAqH| | 11 (53)
verses.samhita: ~MyathA&sati|̍ sugaM mEśhAya# mEśhyA# avA̱Mba rudra-madimahyava̍# dEvaM tyraMbakaM|̍ yathA# naH śrEyasaH̍ karad yathA# nO vasyasaH̍ karad yathA# naH paśumataH karad yathA# nO vyavasAqyayA̱t| | tyraMbakaM̍ ~MyajAmahE sugandhiM puśhTivarddha̍naM|̍ urvAqruka-miva̍ bandhanAn̍ mRutyOr mukśhIya̍ mA&mRutA̱t| | Eśha tE# rudra BAqgastaM juśhasva̍ tEnAvasEna̍# parO mUjavatO&tIhya̍ ( ) vatatadhanvAq̍ pinAkahastaH̍ kRuttivAsAH|̍ | 11

verses.padam: (Padam) aindrAqgnamityai̱ndra - agnam| dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAqlam| vaiśvadEvamiti# vaiśva-dEvam| carum| indrAya|̍ śunAqsIrAya|̍ purODAśa̱m| dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAqlam| vAqyavya̱m| payaH|̍ sauryam| EkakapAlamityEka̍# - kapAqlam| dvAqdaśagavamiti# dvAdaśa - gavam| sIra̱m| dakśhiṇA|̍ AqgnEyam| aśhTAkapAlamityaśhTA̍ - kapAqlam| niriti|̍ vapati| raudram| gAqvIdhukam| carum| aindram| dadhi|̍ vAqruṇam| yavamayamiti# yava-maya̱m| carum| vahinI̱| dhEnuH| dakśhiṇA|̍ yE| dEvAH| puraH sada iti# puraH - sadaH|̍ agninE̱trAq ityagni - nEtrAqH| dakśhiṇasada iti# dakśhiṇa - sadaH|̍ yamanE̱trAq iti# yama - nEtrAqH| paścAqthsada iti# paścAt - sadaH|̍ savitRunE̱trAq iti# savitRu - nEtrAqH| uttarasada ityuttara̍ - sadaH|̍ varuṇanEtrAq̍ iti varuṇa̍ - nEtrAqH| upariśhada ityupari̍ - sadaH|̍ bRuhaspatinEtrAq̍ iti bRuhaspati# - nEtrAqH| rakśhOhaṇa iti# rakśhaH - hanaH|̍ tE| naH| pAqntu| tE| naH| avantu| tEByaH|̍ 12 (50)
verses.samhita: aindrAqgnaM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ ~MvaiśvadEvaM carumindrAya̍ śunAqsIrAya̍ purODAśaM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ ~MvAyavyaM̍ payaH̍ sauryamEkakapAlaM̍ dvAdaśagavaṃ sIraM dakśhiṇA-̍ &&gnEya-maśhTAkapAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ raudraM gAvIdhukaM̍ carumaindraM dadhi# vAruṇaM ~Myavamaya̍M̍ caruM ~MvahinI# dhEnur dakśhiṇAq̍ yE dEvAH purassadO&gninE̱trA̍ dakśhiṇasadO# yamanE̱trAH paścAqthsadaH̍ savitRunE̱trA uttarasadO varuṇanEtrA̍ upariśhadO bRuhaspatinEtrA̍ rakśhOhaṇastE naH̍ pAntu tE nO&vantu̍ tEByO - [ ] 12

verses.padam: (Padam) namaH|̍ tEByaH|̍ svAhA̱| samUDhamiti̍ saM - UDham| rakśhaH|̍ saMdagdhamiti̍ saM-dagdham| rakśhaH|̍ idam| aham| rakśhaH|̍ aBi| samiti|̍ dahAqmi| agnayE̱| rakśhOGna iti# rakśhaH - GnE| svAhA̱| yamAya|̍ savitrE| varuṇAya|̍ bRuhaspatayE|̍ duvasvatE|̍ rakśhOGna iti# rakśhaH-GnE| svAhA̱| praśhTivAqhIti# praśhTi-vAqhI| rathaH|̍ dakśhiṇA|̍ dEvasya|̍ tvAq| savituH| prasava iti# pra - savE| aśvinO̱H| bAqhuByAqmiti# bAqhu-ByAqm| pUśhṇaH| hastA̱ByAm| rakśhasaH|̍ vadham| juhOmi| hatam| rakśhaH|̍ avadhiśhma|̍ rakśhaH|̍ yat| vastE̱| tat| dakśhiṇA|̍ | 13 (45) (tEByaH-pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: namastEByaH svAhAq samUDhaṃq̍ rakśhaH sanda#gdhaṃq̍ rakśha# idamahaṃ rakśhO&Bi saM dahAmyagnayE̍# rakśhOGnE svAhA# yamAya# savitrE varuṇAya̍ bRuhaspatayE̍ duvasvatE̍ rakśhOGnE svAhA̱ praśhTivAqhI rathO dakśhiṇA̍ dEvasya# tvA savituH prasavE̱&śvinO̱r̍ bAqhuByA̱M pUśhṇO hastA̱ByAqṃq rakśhasO̍ vadhaM juhOmi̍ hataṃ rakśhO&vadhiśhma̍ rakśhO yad vastE tad dakśhiṇA|̍ | 13 (tEByaH-pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A7)

verses.padam: (Padam) dhAqtrE| purODAśa̱m| dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAqlam| niriti|̍ vapati| anumatyAq̍ ityanu# - matyai| carum| rAqkAyai̱| carum| sinIvAqlyai| carum| kuhvai̱| carum| mithunau| gAvau̱| dakśhiṇA|̍ AqgnAqvaiśhṇavamityA̱gnA -vaiśhṇavam| EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAqlam| niriti|̍ vapati| aindrAqvaiśhṇavamityai̱ndrA - vaiśhṇavam| EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAqlam| vaiśhṇavam| trikapAqlamiti# tri - kapAqlam| vAqmanaH| vahI| dakśhiṇA|̍ agnIśhOmIyamityagnI̍ - sOmIya̱m| EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAqlam| niriti|̍ vapati| indrAqsOmIyamitI̱ndrA - sOmIya̱m| EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAqlam| saumyam| carum| baBruH| dakśhiṇA|̍ sOmAqpauśhṇamiti# sOmA - pauśhṇam| carum| niriti|̍ vapati| aindrAqpauśhṇamityai̱ndrA - pauśhṇam| carum| pauśhṇam| carum| śyAqmaH| dakśhiṇA|̍ vaiśvAqnaram| dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa-kapAqlam|̍ niriti# ( )| vapati| hiraṇyam|̍ dakśhiṇA|̍ vAqruṇam| yavamayamiti# yava - maya̱m| carum| aśvaH|̍ dakśhiṇA|̍ | 14 (58)
verses.samhita: dhAqtrE purODAśaM̍ dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapatyanu̍matyai̍ caruṃ rAqkAyai# caruṃ sinIvAqlyai̍ caruM kuhvai# caruM mithunau̍ gAvau dakśhiṇA̍ &&gnAvaiśhṇava-mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapatyaindrAvaiśhṇava-̍ mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ ~MvaiśhṇavaM trikapAqlaM̍ ~MvAmanO̍ vahI dakśhiṇA-&gnIśhOmIya-mEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ nirvapatIndrAsOmIya-̍ mEkAdaśakapAlaṃ̍ saumyaM caruM baBrur dakśhiṇA̍ sOmApauśhṇaM caruM nirvapatyaindrA̍ pauśhṇaM caruM pauśhṇaM caruṅ śyAqmO dakśhiṇA̍ vaiśvAnaraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ nir ( ) vapati̍ hiraṇyaM̍ dakśhiṇA̍ vAruṇaM ~Myavamaya̍M̍ carumaśvO dakśhiṇA|̍ | 14

verses.padam: (Padam) bAqṛ qhaspatyam| carum| niriti|̍ vapati| brahmaṇaH|̍ gRuhE| śitipRuśhTha iti# śiti - pRuśhThaH| dakśhiṇA|̍ aindram| EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa-kapAqlam|̍ rAqjanyasya|̍ gRuhE| RuśhaBaH| dakśhiṇA|̍ Aqdityam| carum| mahiśhyai|̍ gRuhE| dhEnuH| dakśhiṇA|̍ naira. Rutamiti# naiH-Rutam| carum| parivRuktyA# iti# pari-vRuktyai̱| gRuhE| kRuśhṇAnA̱m| vrIhIṇAm| naKanirBinnamiti̍# naKa-nirBinnam| kRuśhṇA| kUTA| dakśhiṇA|̍ AqgnEyam| aśhTAkapAlamityaśhTA̍ - kapAqlam| sEnAqnya# iti# sEnA - nyaH|̍ gRuhE| hiraṇyam|̍ dakśhiṇA|̍ vAqruṇam| daśakapAlamiti̍ daśa-kapAqlam|̍ sUtasya|̍ gRuhE| mahAniraśhTa̍ iti# mahA-niraśhTaH| dakśhiṇA|̍ mAqrutam| saptakapAlamiti̍# sapta - kapAqlam| grAqmaṇya# iti# grAma - nyaH|̍ gRuhE| pRuśniH|̍ dakśhiṇA|̍ sAqvitram| dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAqlam| 15 (50)
verses.samhita: bAqrq. haspatyaM caruM nirvapati̍ brahmaṇO# gRuhE śitipRuśhThO̍ dakśhiṇaindra-mEkA̍daśakapAlaṃ̍ rAjanyasya̍ gRuha RuśhaBO̍ dakśhiṇA&&dityaM̍ caruM mahiśhyai̍ gRuhE dhEnur dakśhiṇA̍ naiṛ RutaM caruM parivRuktyai̍# gRuhE kRuśhṇAnA̱M ~MvrIhIṇAM naKanirBinnaM̍ kRuśhṇA kUTA dakśhiṇA̍ &&gnEyamaśhTAkapAlaṃ̍ sEnAqnyO# gRuhE hiraṇyaM̍ dakśhiṇA̍ vAruṇaM daśakapAlaṃ̍ sUtasya# gRuhE mahAniraśhTO̍ dakśhiṇA̍ mArutaṃ saptakapAlaM̍ grAmaṇyO# gRuhE pRuś~ja0079;̍ qr dakśhiṇA̍ sAvitraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ - [ ] 15

verses.padam: (Padam) kśhattuH| gRuhE| upaddhvasta ityupa̍ - dhvastaH| dakśhiṇA|̍ Aqśvinam| dvikapAqlamiti# dvi - kapAqlam| sa~ggrahIturiti# saM-grahItuH| gRuhE| savAqtyAviti̍# sa - vAqtyau̱| dakśhiṇA|̍ pauśhṇam| carum| BAqgaduGasyEti# BAga - duGasya|̍ gRuhE| śyAqmaH| dakśhiṇA|̍ raudram| gAqvIdhukam| carum| akśhAqvAqpasyEtyakśha̍ - AqvAqpasya|̍ gRuhE| śabalaH|̍ udvAra̍ ityut - vAqraH| dakśhiṇA|̍ indrAya|̍ sutrAMṇa iti# su - trAMṇE̱| purODAśa̱m| EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAqlam| prati|̍ niriti|̍ vapati| indrAya|̍ aṃqhOmuca ityaṃhaH-mucE̱|̍ ayam| naH| rAjA̱| vRutrahEti# vRutra-hA| rAjA̱| BUtvA| vRutram| vaddhyAqt| maitrAqbAqṛ qhaspatyamiti# maitrA-bAqṛ qhaspatyam| Bavati| śvEtAyai̱| śvEtavathsAyAq̍ iti# śvEta-vathsAqyai| dugdhE| svayamUMqrta iti# svayam-mUrtE| svayamaMqthita iti# svayaM - mathitE| AjyE̱| AśvatthE|̍ 16 (50)
verses.samhita: kśhattur gRuha upaddhvastO̍ dakśhiṇA&&śvinaM̍ dvikapAqlaṃ̍ sa~ggrahItur̍ gRuhE savAqtyau̍# dakśhiṇA̍ pauśhṇaM caruM BAgaduGasya̍# gRuhE śyAqmO dakśhiṇA̍ raudraM gAvIdhukaM̍ carumakśhAvAqpasya̍# gRuhE śabala udvArO̍ dakśhiṇEndrAya̍ sutrAMṇE# purODAśamEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ prati nirvapatIndrA̍yAṃhOmucE̍ &yaM nO rAjA# vRutrahA rAjA# BUtvA vRutraM ~MvaddhyAn̍ maitrAbAṛ haspatyaM Bavati̍ śvEtAyai̱ śvEtavathsAyai̍ dugdhE svayaMmUrtE̍ svayaMmathita̍ Ajya AśvatthE̍ - [ ] 16

verses.padam: (Padam) pAtrE̱| catuHsraktAqviti̍ catuH̍ - sraktau| svayamavapannAyAq iti# svayaM-avapannAyai̱| śAKAyai|̍ karṇAn| ca| akarṇAn|̍ ca| taṇDulAn| vIti|̍ cinuyAqt| yE| karṇAH| saH| payasi|̍ bAqṛ qhaspatyaH| yE| akarṇAH|̍ saH| AjyE̱| maitraH| svayakRuMqtEti# svayam - kRutA| vEdiH|̍ Bavati| svayadiMqnamiti# svayaM - dinam| barq. hiH| svayakRuMqta iti# svayaM - kRutaH| iddhmaH| sA| Eva| śvEtA| śvEtavathsEti# śvEta - vathsAq| dakśhiṇA|̍ | 17 (33) (sAvitraM dvAdaśakapAla-mAśva̍tthE̍ trayastriṃśacca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: pAtrE catuHsraktau̍ svayamavapannAyai śAKAyai̍ karṇAṅścAkarṇAṅśca̍ taṇDulAn vi cinuyAd̍ yE karṇAH sa payasi̍ bAṛ haspatyO yE&karṇAqH̍ sa AjyE# maitraH svayaMkRutA̍ vEdir̍ Bavati svayandiqnaM barq. hiH svayaMkRuta̍ iddhmaH saiva śvEtA śvEtavathsAq̍ dakśhiṇA|̍ | 17 (sAvitraM dvAdaśakapAla-mAśva̍tthE̍ trayastriṃśacca)̍ (A9)

verses.padam: (Padam) agnayE̱| gRuhapataya̍ iti# gRuha - patayE| purODAśa̱m| aśhTAkapAlamityaśhTA̍ - kapAqlam| niriti|̍ vapati| kRuśhṇAnA̱m| vrIhIṇAm| sOmAya|̍ vanaspatayE|̍ śyAqmAqkam| carum| savitrE| satyaprasavAqyEti̍# satya - prasavAqya| purODAśa̱m| dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAqlam| AqśUnAm| vrIhIṇAm| rudrAya|̍ paśupataya̍ iti# paśu - patayE|̍ gAqvIdhukam| carum| bRuhaspatayE|̍ vAqcaH| patayE|̍ naivAqram| carum| indrAya|̍ jyEśhThAya|̍ purODAśa̱m| EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa̍ - kapAqlam| mahAvrIhIṇAqmiti̍# mahA-vrIhIṇAqm| mitrAya|̍ satyAya|̍ AqbAMnA̱m| carum| varuṇAya|̍ dharmapataya̍ iti dharma - patayE| yavamayamiti# yava - maya̱m| carum| savitA| tvAq| prasavAnAqmiti# pra - savAnA̱m| suvatAqm| agniH| gRuhapatInAqmiti̍# gRuha - patInAqm| sOmaH|̍ vanaspatInAm|̍ rudraH| paśUnAm| 18 (50)
verses.samhita: agnayE# gRuhapatayE̍ purODAśamaśhTAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ kRuśhṇAnA̱M vrIhIṇAṃ sOmAya̍ vanaspatayE̍ śyAmAqkaM caruṃ savitrE̍ satyaprasavAya̍ purODAśaM dvAdaśakapAla-mAśUnAM̍ ~MvrIhIṇAṃ̍ rudrAya# paśupatayE̍ gAvIdhukaM caruM bRuhaspatayE̍ vAqcaspatayE̍ naivAqraM carumindrAya̍ jyEśhThAya# purODAśa-mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ mahAvrIhIṇAM̍ mitrAya# satyAyAq&&MbAnA̱M caruM ~MvaruṇAya̍ dharmapatayE̍ yavamayaM̍ caruṃ savitA̍ tvA̱ prasavAnAṃ# suvatAmagnir gRuhapatInAqṃq̍ sOmO vanaspatInAṃ̍ rudraH paśUnAM̍ -[ ] 18

verses.samhita: bRuhaspatir̍ vAqcAmindrO̱ jyEśhThAnA̱M mitraH satyAnAqM ~MvaruṇO̍ dharmapatInAqM̍ ~MyE dEvA̍ dEvasuvaH stha ta ima-mAmuśhyAyaṇa-ma̍namitrAya̍# suvaddhvaM mahatE kśhatrAya# mahata AdhipatyAya̍ mahatE jAnarAjyAyaiśha̍ vO# BaratAq rAjAq sOmO&smAkaM̍ brAhmaṇAnAqṃq rAjAq prati tyannAma# rAqjya-madhAyi̍ svAM tanuvaM ~MvaruṇO̍ aśiśrEcCucE̱r mitrasya vratyA# aBUmAmanmahi̍ mahata Rutasya nAma sarvE vrAtAq ( ) varuṇasyABUvan̍ vi mitra Evai-rarAti-matArIdasU̍śhudanta̍ yajñiyA# RutEna vyu# tritO jarimAṇa̍M̍ na AnaD viśhṇOH kramO&si̍ viśhṇOH̱ krAqntamasi̍ viśhṇOr vikrA̱nta-masi| | 19 (paśUnAM-~MvrAtAqH-pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A10)

verses.padam: (Padam) AqgnEyam| aśhTAkapAlamityaśhTA-kapAqlam|̍ niriti|̍ vapati| hiraṇyam|̍ dakśhiṇA|̍ sAqrasvatam| carum| vathsatarI| dakśhiṇA|̍ sAqvitram| dvAdaśakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAqlam| upaddhvasta ityupa̍ - dhvastaH| dakśhiṇA|̍ pauśhṇam| carum| śyAqmaH| dakśhiṇA|̍ bAqṛ qhaspatyam| carum| śitipRuśhTha iti# śiti - pRuśhThaH| dakśhiṇA|̍ aindram| EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa-kapAqlam|̍ RuśhaBaH| dakśhiṇA|̍ vAqruṇam| daśakapAlamiti̍ daśa# - kapAqlam| mahAniraśhTa̍ iti# mahA-niraśhTaH| dakśhiṇA|̍ saumyam| carum| baBruH| dakśhiṇA|̍ tvAqśhTram| aśhTAkapAlamityaśhTA̍ - kapAqlam| śuṇThaH| dakśhiṇA|̍ vaiśhṇavam| trikapAqlamiti# tri - kapAqlam| vAqmanaH| dakśhiṇA|̍ | 33 (42) (AqgnEyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ̍ sArasvataM-dvicatvAriṃśat̍ )(A17)

verses.samhita: sadyO dI̱kśhayanti sadyaH sOmaM̍ krIṇanti puṇDarisrajAM pra yacCati̍ daśaBir̍ vathsataraiH sOmaM̍ krIṇAti daśapEyO# Bavati śataM brA̱hmaṇAH pibanti̍ saptadaśaṅ stOtraM Bavati̍ prAkAqśAvaddhvaryavE̍# dadAti sraja-mudgAqtrE̍ rukmaṃ hOtrE&śvaM̍ prastOtRupratihartRuByAqM dvAdaśa̍ paśhThauhIr brahmaṇE# vaśAM mai̱trAvaruṇAyaṛ̍ śhaBaM brA̱hmaṇAcCaṃqsinE vAsasI̍ nEśhTApOtRuByAqṅq sthUri# yavAcita-macCAvAqkAyA̍naDvAha̍-magnIdhE̍# BArgavO hOtA# Bavati śrAyantIyaM̍ brahmasAqmaM Bavati̍ vAravantIya# ( ) magniśhTOmasAqmaṃ sArasvatI-rapO̍ gRuhṇAti|̍ | 34

verses.padam: (Padam) śUraH|̍ vAq| pRuthsviti# pRut-su| kAsu|̍ cit| | dEvAnA̱m| yaH| it| manaH|̍ yajamAnaH|̍ iyakśhati|̍ aBIti|̍ it| ayajvanaH|̍ Buvat| | na| yajamAqna| riśhyasi| na| sunvAqna| na| dEvayO iti# dEva-yO| | asat|̍ atra|̍ suvIryamiti# su - vIrya̱m| uta| tyat| AqśvaśviyamityA̍śu-aśvi̍yam|̍ | nakiH|̍ tam| karmaṇA|̍ naśat| na| prEti|̍ yOśhat| na| yOśhati| | upEti|̍ kśharanti| sindhavaH|̍ mayOBuva iti# mayaH - BuvaH|̍ IjAqnam| ca| yakśhyamAṇam|̍ ca| dhEnavaH|̍ | pRuṇanta̱m| ca| papurim|̍ ca| 41 (50)
verses.samhita: śUrO# vA pRuthsu kAsu# cit| dEvAnAqM ~Mya inmanO yajamAna̍ iyakśhatyaBIdaya̍jvanO̍ Buvat| | na yajamAna̍ riśhyasi na sunvAna̍ na dEvayO|̍ | asadatra# suvIryamuta̍ tyadAqśvaśviyaM|̍ | nakiśhTaM karmaṇA̍ naśanna pra yOśhanna̍ yOśhati|̍ | upa# kśharanti sindhavO̍ mayOBuva# IjAqnaM ca# yakśhyamAṇaM̍ ca dhEnavaH|̍ pRuṇantaM̍ ca papuriM̍ ca - [ ] 41

verses.padam: (Padam) śravasyavaH|̍ GRutasya|̍ dhArA̱H| upEti|̍ yanti| viśvataH|̍ | sOmArudrEti̍ sOmA̱-rudrAq| vIti|̍ vRuhatam| viśhUcIm|̍ amIvA|̍ yA| naH| gaya̱m| AqvivEśEtyA̱ - vivEśa|̍ | AqrE| bAqdhEthAqm| niṛ Rutimiti̍ niH - Rutim| parAqcaiH| kRutam| cit| EnaH|̍ prEti|̍ mumuktam| asmat| | sOmArudrEti̍ sOmA̱-rudrAq| yuvam| EtAni|̍ asmE iti|̍ viśvA̱| tanUśhu|̍ BEśhajAni|̍ dhattam| avEti|̍ syatam| mu~jcata̱m| yat| naH| asti|̍ tanUśhu|̍ baddham| kRutam| EnaH|̍ asmat| sOmApUśhaṇEti̍ sOmA̱ - pUśhaṇAq| jananA|̍ rayIṇAm| jananA|̍ divaH| jananA̍ ( )| pRuthivyAH| | jAqtau| viśvasya|̍ Buvanasya|̍ gOpau| dEvAH| akRuṇvann| amRutasya|̍ nABi̱m| | imau| dEvau| jAyamAnau|̍ juśhanta| imau| tamAṃsi|̍ gUhatAqm| ajuśhTA|̍ | AqByAm| indraH|̍ pakvam| AqmAsu|̍ antaH| sOmAqpUśhaByAqmiti# sOmApUśha - ByAqm| janat| usriyAsu|̍ | 42 (75) (bRuhataH-śavasAq-rathaH-papu̍riM̍ ca-divO jananAq-pa~jca̍viṃśatiśca)̍ (A22) Prasna KOrvai with starting Padams of 1 to 22 Anuvaakams :- anumatyA-AgnEya-mai̱ndrAqgna-magnayE-sOmA̍ya-pratipUruśha-mai̱ndrAqgnaM-dhAqtrE̍ - bAṛ̍ haspatya-magnayE-&rthatO-dEvI̱H-samidhaṃq-sOmasyE-ndrasya̍ -mitra-A̱gnEyaṃ-sadya-A̱gnEyaṃ-mA̱gnEyaṅ-svAqdvIM tvA-&gnAviśhṇU-dvAviṃ̍śatiH|̍ ) KOrvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Pancaatis :- (anumatyai-yathA&sa̍ti-dEvI̍rApO-mitrO̍&si-śUrO̍# vAq-dvicatvAriṃśat|̍ ) First and Last Padam of Eighth Prasnam :- (anumatyA-usriyA̍su|̍ ) Kanda KOrvai with starting Padams of Eight Prasnas of Kandam 1 :- (iśha-ApO-dEvasyA-&&da̍dE-dEvAsurAH-saM̍ tvA-pAkayajña-manu̍matyai|̍ )| | hariH̍ OM| | | | kRuśhṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇDE pada pAThE aśhTamaH praśnaH samAptaH| | | | iti prathamaM kAṇDaM| |
verses.samhita: śravasyavO# GRutasya dhArAq upa# yanti viśvataH|̍ | sOmArudrAq̍ vi vRuhataM̍ ~MviśhUcImamI̍vAq̍ yA nO gaya-mAvivEśa̍|̍ AqrE bAdhEthAqM̍ niṛ RutiM̍ parAqcaiH kRutaM cidEnaH pra mumukta-masmat|̍ | sOmArudrA̍ yuva-mEtAnyasmE viśvA# tanUśhu# BEśhajAni# dhattaM| ava# syataM mu~jcataM ~MyannO asti# tanUśhu# baddhaM kRutamEnO# asmat| | sOmApUśhaṇAq̍ jananA̍ rayIṇAM jananA̍ divO jananA̍ ( ) pRuthivyAH| jAqtau viśvasya̍ Buvanasya̍ gOpau dEvA akRuṇvannamRuta̍sya̍ nABi̱M| | imau dEvau jAyamAnau̍ juśhantEmau tamAṃsi̍ gUhatAq-majuśhTA|̍ AqByAmindraH̍ pakvamAqmAsvantaH sOmApUśhaByA̱M̍ janadusriyAsu|̍ | 42 (bRuhataH-śavasAq-rathaH-papu̍riM̍ ca-divO jananAq-pa~jca̍viṃśatiśca)̍ (A22) praśna korvai with starting padams of 1 to 22 anuvAkams :- (anumatyA-AgnEya-mai̱ndrAqgnamagnayE-sOmA̍ya-̍ pratipUruśha-mai̱ndrAgnaM-dhAqtrE bAṛ̍ haspatya-magnayEr-&thatO-dEvI̱H-samidhaṃq-sOmasyE-ndrasya̍ -mitra-A̱gnEyaṃ-sadya-A̱gnEyaṃ-mA̱gnEyaṅ-svAqdvIM tvA-&gnAviśhṇU-dvAviṃ̍śatiH|̍ ) korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (anumatyai-yathA&sa̍ti-dEvI̍rApO-mitrO̍&si-śUrO̍# vAq-dvicatvAriṃśat|̍ ) first and last padam of Eighth praśnam :- (anumatyA-usriyA̍su|̍ ) kAnda korvai with starting padams of Eight praśnas of kAndam 1:- (iśha-ApO-dEvasyA-&&̍ dadE-dEvAsurAH-saM̍ tvA-pAkayajña-manu̍matyai|̍ )| | hariH̍ OM| | | | kRuśhṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇDE aśhtamaH praśnaH samAptaH| | | | iti prathamaM kAṇDaM| | =======================================
